abstract.t: TDM over IP (TDMoIP) is a structure-aware method for transporting Time Division Multiplexed (TDM) signals as pseudowires (PWs). By ensuring TDM structure integrity, TDMoIP is able to better withstand network degradations. As TDM signaling and individual channels are visible, it is possible to use mechanisms that exploit or manipulate these to conceal packet loss or conserve bandwidth.
